author: Ram

review: I bought one of these for my HD LCD in my bedroom.  What a great purchase.  Using this and my Android phone I'm able to push Netflix, Pandora, Google Music and a variety of other apps to my TV.  Its an easy install, if you can get to your HDMI plug on your TV all you have to do is plug the Chromecast in and then plug the supplied power plug into the wall to power the Chromecast.  Its that easy.  The setup took 5 minutes using the Android Chromecast app on Google Play. The only thing that suprised me was the device is a bit bigger than I expected, but it comes with an extension in case it needs to hang freely behind your TV or device instead of plugged in directly.
author: Adam G

review: So I plugged it in hoping that it would be some amazing "use your tablet and view your pics and videos on your tv" kind of thing. The app you have to find /sucks/ and nothing else really works. Netflix keeps crashing and I wish I had saved 30 dollars. It's a pass for me. I've spent a week now before writing this review to make sure it wasn't me. If you have any modern gaming consoles,  you can do everything this can do and more on it.

review: This is my second Chromecast.  I have netflix and decided to utilize my internet connection.  I don't have  a cable box on the third floor and Chromecast works great!  Netflixs, Youtube, Xfinity to go, hulu comes through crystal clear.  I can also add channels through my tablet and watch on them tv.  I love this.  If I need to use the computer the grandchildren can still enjoy their favorite shows.  Most tablets work great but I have a Samsung Tab taht works a remote.  Loving this Chromecast!
